node.excerpt: [DataDog](https://www.datadoghq.com/) is a monitoring service for cloud-scale applications, in the following guide we'll see how to create a docker container with the [DataDog agent](https://docs.datadoghq.com/agent/?tab=agentv6) and how to use it to publish metrics.

frontmatter.title: Install DataDog Agent as a docker container
